name: Website Data Extractor
special_instructions: The 'startUrls' filter is required and must be an array of URLs from which to extract LD+JSON data.
The 'customData' filter is optional and can be used to provide some custom data to output.
The tool will return the following entities: 'title', 'author', 'source_code', 'categories', 'data', 'url', 'customData', '#error', '#debug'. If an entity is not listed here, it won't be returned.
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
